description: This file is a shell script used to configure and manage wireless interfaces and access points, including setting security protocols, updating interface configurations, and starting the hostapd service for a Raspberry Pi or similar device.

methods.name: update_wirelessinterface_private_wifi_2G
methods.description: Updates the configuration for the 2G private WiFi interface in the hostapd configuration file.

methods.name: update_wirelessinterface_private_wifi_5G
methods.description: Updates the configuration for the 5G private WiFi interface in the hostapd configuration file.

methods.name: update_wirelessinterface_public_wifi_2G
methods.description: Updates the configuration for the 2G public WiFi interface in the hostapd configuration file.

methods.name: update_wirelessinterface_public_wifi_5G
methods.description: Updates the configuration for the 5G public WiFi interface in the hostapd configuration file.

methods.name: Get_wirelessinterface_private_wifi_2G
methods.description: Retrieves and updates the 2G private WiFi interface configuration.

methods.name: Get_wirelessinterface_private_wifi_5G
methods.description: Retrieves and updates the 5G private WiFi interface configuration.

methods.name: Get_wirelessinterface_public_wifi_2G
methods.description: Retrieves and updates the 2G public WiFi interface configuration.

methods.name: Get_wirelessinterface_public_wifi_5G
methods.description: Retrieves and updates the 5G public WiFi interface configuration.

methods.name: Disabling_XfinityWiFi
methods.description: Disables the WiFi interface for Xfinity WiFi, optionally downing the interface based on hotspot configuration.
